chimeracardsplus:BitingPreview.NAME: Biting
chimeracardsplus:BitingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Damage -20%. NL Heal HP equal to cost.

chimeracardsplus:DecayingPreview.NAME: Decaying
chimeracardsplus:DecayingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Take 2 damage if in your hand at the end of your turn.

chimeracardsplus:DisgracefulPreview.NAME: Disgraceful
chimeracardsplus:DisgracefulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Frail if in your hand at the end of your turn.

chimeracardsplus:HesitantPreview.NAME: Hesitant
chimeracardsplus:HesitantPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak if in your hand at the end of your turn.

chimeracardsplus:LiquidizingPreview.NAME: Liquidizing
chimeracardsplus:LiquidizingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion if this kills an enemy. NL Exhaust.

chimeracardsplus:RegretfulPreview.NAME: Regretful
chimeracardsplus:RegretfulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand if in your hand at the end of your turn.

chimeracardsplus:UnawakenedPreview.NAME: Unawakened
chimeracardsplus:UnawakenedPreview.DESCRIPTION: Becomes Awakened when transformed or removed.
